dict.acceptation: 教授；（大学的）讲师，教员；自称者，宣称者；

sent.orig: An assistant professor who receives tenure becomes professor and may later be appointed a full professor.
sent.trans: 得到雇佣的助理教授将成为副教授而且之后还可能被聘为正教授。

sent.orig: He was appointed an assistant professor in 1972, associate professor in 1976, and professor in 1988.
sent.trans: 1972年被任命为助理教授、1976年被任命为副教授、1988年被任命为教授。

sent.orig: An professor who receives tenure becomes an professor and may later be appointed a full professor.
sent.trans: 一个获得了长期聘用的助教接着就可以成为一名副教授并且往后可能被任命为正教授。

sent.orig: An assistant professor who receives tenure becomes an professor and may later be appointed full professor.
sent.trans: 收到保有期的助理教授成为一名副教授，并且之后可能被授予全职教授。

sent.orig: Duncan, assistant professor and professor of education and social policy, respectively.
sent.trans: 分别为教育与社会政策学助教授与教授。
